summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the municipal light and power plant and system; authorizing an agreement with Pend Oreille County Public Utility District No. 1 of Pend Oreille County, Washington, providing for the settlement of certain litigation and for a method of operation under the power purchase contract between the parties authorized by Ordinance 84789 and for reservations of power by the District from the City under FPC License No. 2144.
